**Tender Notice Info**

### General Information

* **Tender Title:** PW-23-01021285
* **Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

### Status and Cancellation

This tender has been cancelled.

### Category and Notice Type

* **Category:** SRVTGD
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

### Business Requirements

* **Goods/Services:** Generators and Generator Sets, Electrical - Repair
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Locations

* **Regions of Opportunity:** World
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* **Contact Person:** Jean-Francois Lemay
* **Email:** jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 343-571-9706
* **Address:** 2001 Robert-Bourassa, Floor 6, Room 671-L, Montréal, QC H3A 3N2
